Summary: I have just broken a sequencing code in the Bible that offers Full disclosure of crafts and E.T.s
divs: sighting detailsi have spent years and thousands of hours on the following discovery that is incredible. i am disclosing my work this week. i have had a story ran in the norman transcript this past sunday 06\02\2013. section a-5. this is not a joke. i have 3-d graphs and pictures of flying crafts, d.n.a sequences, and four distinct races of e.t. beings with messages incliuded in the text of genesis. please take a look at the article and the you you tube video i made yesterday. it will give you a brief show of some of my findings.i have over 3000 hours in this year alone on this project and my data is sound.i do not know who to contact and i looked you up on the internet. i have contacted the dept. of defense and the c.i.a last night via e-mail. i am 100 percent sure mt data will stand up to scrutiny. there is so much more i cannot begin to explain. youtu.be\miegfzamjmc thank you, michael masten
